name: Experimental Gameplay #3 - Legacy
description:
This game consists of an experimental prototype for a short game.

Goal: Eliminate all the enemies without dying.

Controls:

* WASD to move.

* Click to fire bullets.

* Press Escape to quit the game.

This game was made for a class at the University of Utah known as "Experimental Gameplay", which challenges students to make short games with unique mechanics using a gamejam-like format. The prompt for this game was "Legacy" (the boardgame mechanic specifically). I decided to focus the game around dealing with the consequences of your past actions, as your attacks modify the terrain around you.
